Body.Content:
We are announcing the enablement of run and action-level ROI tracking for autonomous agents in Microsoft Copilot Studio. This feature will reach general availability on July 15, 2025.

How does this affect me?
Run and action-level ROI tracking for autonomous agents helps identify high-value behaviors and optimize agent design for efficiency.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Microsoft Copilot Studio - Analytics: ROI for Autonomous Agents
